msg: Added the default file attributes for NetWare

author: bnicholes
msg: Added a Winsock cleanup call required by NetWare

author: trawick
msg: returned APR_SUCCESS instead of APR_EOF when PeekNamedPipe failed
and the result from GetLastError() was ERROR_BROKEN_PIPE. Because
of this, the pipe wasn't closed as soon as it could be.
